alert.note: Alert for La Plata; Montezuma (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued April 03 at 4:10PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY HEALTH ADVISORY FOR BLOWING DUST FROM 400 PM MONDAY UNTIL 800 PM MONDAY... The Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment has issued the following... WHAT...Air Quality Health Advisory for Blowing Dust. WHERE...Saguache, Rio Grande, Alamosa, Conejos, Costilla, Archuleta, and La Plata counties. Locations include, but are not limited to Saguache, Del Norte, Alamosa, Conejos, Pagosa Springs, and Durango. WHEN...400 PM Monday April 03 to 800 PM Monday April 03 IMPACTS...Strong and gusty winds will produce areas of blowing dust on Monday. The threat for blowing dust will gradually diminish by Monday evening. HEALTH INFORMATION...Public Health Recommendations: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms in sensitive individuals, aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with cardiopulmonary disease and older adults. People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.
